price: И они говоре: „Кад ће већ једном та пресуда, ако истину говорите?“
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡفَتۡحُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-fatḥu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
